---
title: Submit Signed Delegate Transaction for Broadcast
slug: /staking/cardano/delegate/submit-signed-delegate-transaction
---

import Tabs from "@theme/Tabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Link from "@docusaurus/Link";

After signing the transaction, send a `PUT` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]/next` with the signed payload. The Staking API will broadcast the transaction to the Cardano network.

### Parameters

- `name` &mdash; `string` Name of the action to execute (required).
- `inputs` &mdash; `object`
  - `transaction_payload` &mdash; Signed transaction payload from the previous step's response.

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash {5-8}
curl -X PUT 'https://cardano-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/08a2f987-1215-4bcb-8cb8-1f218708c829/next' \
-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>' \
-d '{
  "name": "sign_delegate_tx",
  "inputs": {
    "transaction_payload": ""
  }
}'
```

### Response

With the signed transaction provided, Staking API will broadcast it to the network. As the transaction progresses towards confirmation, the returned state will be one of:

- `delegate_tx_broadcasting` &mdash; Transaction has been broadcast and is awaiting confirmation.
- `completed` &mdash; Transaction has been confirmed.

#### Sample Response

<Tabs><TabItem value="broadcasting" label="Broadcasting">

```json {4}
{
  "id": "6f995c8a-08b7-43ff-9275-0ef8fc94bc26",
  "operation": "staking",
  "state": "delegate_tx_broadcasting",
  "actions": [
    {
      "name": "wait",
      "estimated_state_change_at": "2023-02-24T17:13:41.756Z",
      "inputs": []
    }
  ],
  "data": {
    "delegator_address": "addr_test1qrwsyak374wzmdakesg8wl8r0feucetatxuqz8s2csqzradxfu7p7cvhrg6eh374ps852jxq7qzgfjwgknn36ggkdwrsu6ae9x",
    "validator_address": "pool1wn6a6f23ctq06udwhw27ravdpd6zcr7jlut3yez0wzdackz3222",
    "registered": null,
    "register_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "33f750583301f5b298e7a4d9d42cd950be86ecd018f8df37e4fb58640d39e997",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "33f750583301f5b298e7a4d9d42cd950be86ecd018f8df37e4fb58640d39e997",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": [
        {
          "account_address": "addr_test1qrwsyak374wzmdakesg8wl8r0feucetatxuqz8s2csqzradxfu7p7cvhrg6eh374ps852jxq7qzgfjwgknn36ggkdwrsu6ae9x",
          "signature": ""
        }
      ],
      "block_time": "2023-02-24T17:09:47.000Z"
    },
    "delegate_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "689c8172693b66d5a649d1bb8e7df8b5a83c828022910602c1e7815b88c1597a",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "689c8172693b66d5a649d1bb8e7df8b5a83c828022910602c1e7815b88c1597a",
      "status": null,
      "error": null,
      "signatures": [
        {
          "account_address": "addr_test1qrwsyak374wzmdakesg8wl8r0feucetatxuqz8s2csqzradxfu7p7cvhrg6eh374ps852jxq7qzgfjwgknn36ggkdwrsu6ae9x",
          "signature": ""
        }
      ],
      "block_time": null
    }
  },
  "network_code": "cardano",
  "chain_code": "preprod",
  "created_at": "2023-02-24T17:06:06.083Z",
  "updated_at": "2023-02-24T17:12:40.672Z"
}
```
